description: When the first snowflakes dance, this winter clothing comes into play. Put on this mid-layer made of soft polyester fleece before heading to Ouray Ice Park in Colorado or to base camp in the Himalayas. This Plartec® fabric with high-performance insulation warms the torso and the moisture is transported away from the skin. What remains is a pleasantly dry feeling for snowshoeing, descents and everything in between.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Power Stretch Pro Jacket - Mens
